title: End game screen not showing
body: After every game I play recently, the end game screen won't show up other than a black rectangle that's about the size of my mouse pointer. When I force it to close, it resets my window size to default even though I made it larger. Help?

replies.body: If you have the option called "close client during game" turned on in the client options it can make that post game lobby take longer to show up. Check for that in the client options, and let me know if that's not the case and we can dig a little further.

No worries, it's a pretty quick and easy step to check so I wanted to be sure of that first. This could also be happening if some of those game files are corrupted as well so let's go ahead and try running a quick repair through the options, and if that still doesn't help go ahead and reach out to our tech team for a little more in-depth troubleshooting.
Yeah, I looked through forums and saw that fix, tried it, it didn't work. Do you think you can direct me to the tech team?
You can contact them the usual [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as always!
